name: Windows Media Center Link File
summary: Learn about .MCL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: While MCL files are commonly used during the application development process, they are discouraged for use in application installation and launching.
MCL files are opened by the WMC host, which is a program called ehshell.exe. They are stored in an XML format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
